result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Waiver of Prelim. filed.  
Court questions deft as to waiver.
Court finds waiver freely and voluntarily made.
COURT finds PC - Defendant bound over for arraignment & trial.  
Information to be E-filed.  Reading Waived.

Plea Hearing in both files:
Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights filed. State moves to:
22CF114:
Ct. 2 (Maintain Drug Trafficking Place-Second and Subsequent Offense-Repeater)>>DRI.
Ct. 3 (Possession of THC (2nd+ Offense)-Repeater)>>DRI.
Ct. 5 (Possess Drug Paraphernalia-Repeater)>>DRI.
Ct. 6 (BJ-Repeater)>>DRI.

22CF110:
Ct. 1 (Retail Theft-Intentionally Take >$500-$5000-Repeater)>>DRI.
Ct. 2 (BJ-Repeater)>>DRI.


COURT GRANTS ABOVE.
  
PLEA: 
22CF114:
Ct. 1 (Manufacture/Deliver THC (<=200g)-Second and Subsequent Offense-Repeater)>> NO CONTEST.
Ct. 4 (Possession of Methamphetamine-Repeater)>> NO CONTEST.

Crt advises def of rights & penalties & ques def to understanding.  Crt finds plea & waiver freely & vol made, a factual basis & def guilty.  

COURT ORDERS: 
22CF114:
Ct. 1 (Manufacture/Deliver THC (<=200g)-Second and Subsequent Offense-Repeater)>> Sentence W/H- 3 Years Probation, Concurrent. CONDITIONS: Assessment/treatment/counseling as recommended, Absolute Sobriety, AODA and Follow up, Maintain Full time work/Full time school or a combination, Court Costs, DNA Sample and Surcharge. Court finds 0 Days Credit.

Ct. 4 (Possession of Methamphetamine-Repeater)>> Sentence W/H- 3 Years Probation, Concurrent. CONDITIONS: Assessment/treatment/counseling as recommended, Absolute Sobriety, AODA and Follow up, Maintain Full time work/Full time school or a combination, Court Costs, DNA Sample and Surcharge. Court finds 0 Days Credit.
